Title: Provides for the designation of geologically significant areas, territories and sites throughout the state, and for the establishment of a state geological trail
Summary: Provides for the designation of geologically significant areas, territories and sites throughout the state, and for the establishment of a state geological trail.
LawCode: Add Art 49 Title 5 §§49-0501 - 49-0505, En Con L; amd §100, Ec Dev L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the economic development law, in relation to establishing a state geological trail
